title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.7 - Project implementation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.7 - Project implementation

State Regulations
A contract defining all terms, conditions and
responsibilities of the successful applicant shall be developed by the
department subsequent to the awarding of funds. The contract may incorporate
the applicant's proposal, including a budget approved by the department, among
its provisions. The department will monitor contract
performance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
391.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
